Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.2.0 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Linux (Kubuntu 22.04) | CPU: Ryzen 7 | GPU: Nvidia RTX 3060 | RAM: 64 Gb

 

Either the eeloo mission does not complete when entering it's sphere of influence, or it's not mentioned that you need to have a kerbal on board.
I tried sending a probe to get some science, but the mission didn't complete.
I collected data high above Eeloo and in low Eeloo orbit

Edited January 12 by The Space Peacock
